Posts.Content: Encouraging for those with TNBC like me. I hope someday I get to share an inspiring story like yours. Amen
Posts.Title: Graduation Day Clinical Trial

Posts.Content: I was in the same clinical trial for nearly 10 months before there was progression in the liver. Hope it keeps you stable for a long time. Best
Posts.Title: Graduation Day Clinical Trial

Posts.Content: Hi I was initially diagnosed stage 2 TNNC in 2015. After the treatment, recurrence in 2017. I’m on Xeloda since March. Earlier was receiving Immunotherapy which worked for 10 months. Then Carboplatin which caused more progression in the liver. Then on another clinical trial Immu 132 which worked for 10 months. Now Xeloda. Hope it works. Praying for your daughter in law! Hugs Anjali
Posts.Title: Some research and new trials for trplple negative stage 4

Posts.Content: Haven’t read the article. Hope it offers hope to people like me who didn’t benefit from Immunotherapy ( I received atezomulab for 9 months before there was progression in the liver in 2017). Always looking for a miracle
Posts.Title: Hopefully good news for tnbc

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing. I’m triple negative stage 4 and got encouraged by the news. God bless Anjali
